title: The Gift
description: Ten-year old Jason Meechum is a quiet young boy who hides himself in fantasy and science fiction books. Other kids pick and make fun of him but he takes it in stride. That's because Jason Meechum has a secret. A secret of pain, fear, and hopelessness. A secret he wants to tell but can't.But all of that is about to change because Jason will be the recipient of something special. Something beautiful and a mystery. Something wondrous and odd. And only he will know about it.Tonight Jason Meechum will have two secrets. One of them will survive. Which will determine if tonight is Jason's last night on earth.The Gift is the third in a series of short stories by Easton Livingston called The Dark Corner. It is a fantasy short story.
author: Easton Livingston
